code: import{auth}from'../Firebase';export var GET_USER='get_user';export var USER_STATUS='user_status';export function getUser(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:USER_STATUS,payload:true});auth.onAuthStateChanged(function(user){dispatch({type:GET_USER,payload:user});dispatch({type:USER_STATUS,payload:false});});};}export function login(email,password){return function(dispatch){return auth.signInWithEmailAndPassword(email,password);};}export function logout(){return function(dispatch){return auth.signOut();};}
